text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Do you want it? Go get it.
author: Public

text: Take the risk or lose the chance
author: Public

text: Challenge to change
author: Public

text: If things don't come that is fine, you will work hard to make them happen.
author: Public

text: Negativity is a virus and a dream killer
author: Public

text: Nothing is going to change until you change it
author: Public

text: Without commitment you will never start but more importantly without consistency you will never finish
author: Denzel Washington

text: To achieve goals, you must apply Discipline and consistency
author: Denzel Washington

text: There is no substitute for hard work
author: Thomas Edison

text: To get something you never had, you have to do something you never did
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Give it everything you GOT
author: Public

text: Life is too short to waste a second
author: Public

text: Success never stops
author: Public

text: Don't be afraid to fail big, to dream big but remember dreams without Goals are just dreams and they ultimately fuel disappointment So have dreams but also have goals
author: Denzel Washington

text: Stop Consuming, start creating
author: Public

text: You will never see a U-Haul behind a hearse
author: Denzel Washington

text: Make your edge in life before life makes its edge on you
author: Public

text: The more you learn, the more you earn
author: Warren Buffet

text: For a man with purpose today is not just a day, it is Money.
author: Public

text: Actions speak louder than words so instead of talking it MAKE IT
author: Public

text: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Gary Player

text: Work with what you have in that case you can get what you want
author: Public

text: Better late than never
author: Proverb

text: When you think it is too late, remember that it can be later than now
author: Public

text: Winners look their race; losers look Winners
author: Public

text: There is more to learn every day
author: Public

text: Be constructive not destructive
author: Public

text: Wake up! You got a dream to live for, a success waiting for you
author: Public

text: Tomorrow is too late
author: Public

text: I am the product of my decisions
author: Stephen Covey

text: You don't have to be Great to start BUT You have to start to be Great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: It is only in Race you can Differentiate Winners from Pretenders
author: Public

text: Positive Thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will ever will.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: At the root of all Misery is unfulfilled desire
author: Siddhartha Gautama

text: You cannot Expect victory and plan for defeat
author: Public

text: The world Steps aside for the Man who knows where he is Going
author: James Allen

text: The man on the top of the mountain. Didn't fall there
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Stay on your lane, keep your eyes and faith on yourself
author: Public

text: Don't go through life, grow through life
author: Public

text: Want to know a way to succeed? Here you go: Day and night, Night and day you got breathe it that's the way
author: Public

text: Persistence is a great weapon against Tough times
author: Calvin Coolidge

text: Think Big start Small and scale fast
author: Public

text: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Don't wait for the right opportunity. CREATE IT
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path
author: Buddha

text: Dreams Don't come for free
author: Public

text: Make the best out of ANYTHING
author: Public

text: There are many criticizers but few critics
author: Public

text: He who says I CAN and he who says I can't are usually Right.
author: Henry Ford

text: NOTHING Comes from NOTHING
author: Parmenides

text: My interest is in the future because I am going to spend the rest of my life there.
author: Charles F.Kettering

text: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: Nothing is more wretched than the mind of a man conscious of guilt.
author: Plautus
